card1.title: Outdated Structures
card1.desc: Other providers often rely on obsolete technology and hardware. Fragmented solutions that fail to meet modern industry standards.

card2.title: Reactive Support
card2.desc: Classic IT waits until something breaks. Slow response times and no holistic care for your enterprise environment.

card3.title: Any Tec Excellence
card3.desc: We cover everything: From enterprise networking to IT support. Latest technologies, proactive monitoring, and professional care for Any Tec.

faq.title: Common
faq.desc: Everything you need to know about starting with Any Tec.

items.q: How does Any Tec support medium-sized and enterprise companies with complex IT infrastructures?
items.a: Any Tec provides planning, implementation, operation, and continuous optimization of complex IT infrastructures. This includes cloud, hybrid, and on-premises environments aligned with business processes and security requirements.

items.q: Which cloud services does Any Tec offer for enterprise customers?
items.a: Any Tec provides services ranging from cloud architecture and migration to ongoing operation and maintenance of hybrid and cloud-based environments.

items.q: How does Any Tec ensure IT security and data protection?
items.a: Any Tec uses structured security concepts, encrypted data transmission based on military-grade standards, and controlled access mechanisms to protect sensitive data.

items.q: Does Any Tec support companies with compliance, audits, and certifications?
items.a: Any Tec supports companies in the technical preparation for audits, certifications, and regulatory requirements and provides appropriate documentation.

items.q: How is IT support organized for medium-sized and enterprise customers?
items.a: IT support is provided through clearly defined service-level agreements with regulated response times and escalation processes.

items.q: Does Any Tec take over existing IT environments from other service providers?
items.a: Existing IT environments are analyzed, documented, and systematically transferred into Any Tec’s operational management.

items.q: How are high availability and business continuity ensured?
items.a: Redundancy concepts, continuous monitoring, backup strategies, and tested recovery processes ensure stable IT operations.

items.q: Are Any Tec’s IT services scalable?
items.a: The implemented solutions are modular and can be adapted to changing requirements or company growth.

items.q: Are dedicated contacts available for enterprise customers?
items.a: Customers receive dedicated contacts responsible for coordination, operations, and further development of the IT environment.

items.q: How are new locations or departments integrated into existing IT structures?
items.a: New locations or departments are integrated into existing IT structures through coordinated processes without disrupting ongoing operations.

items.q: How does Any Tec support local businesses and franchise chains with IT services?
items.a: Any Tec provides standardized, centrally managed IT solutions designed for the daily operation of branches and retail locations.

items.q: Is Any Tec suitable for companies with multiple locations or branches?
items.a: The IT structures are designed for multi-location operations and enable centralized management of all sites.

items.q: How is IT security implemented in branch and shop environments?
items.a: Secured networks, encrypted connections based on military-grade standards, and controlled access concepts are used.

items.q: Does Any Tec support POS systems, online shops, and payment solutions?
items.a: Any Tec integrates and operates POS systems, online shop infrastructures, and connected payment and inventory systems.

items.q: How does IT support work in daily operations?
items.a: Support is focused on fast issue resolution and is provided through clearly defined communication and support channels.

items.q: Is IT operation possible without on-site IT staff?
items.a: IT environments are centrally managed and monitored, eliminating the need for on-site technical staff.

items.q: How are new branches, shops, or retail spaces connected?
items.a: New locations are securely integrated into existing IT structures using standardized procedures.

items.q: Are IT costs predictable for franchise and retail businesses?
items.a: The cost structure is transparent and allows clear budget planning per location.

items.q: How does Any Tec protect customer data and payment information?
items.a: Customer data is protected through encrypted transmission, segmented networks, and proven security mechanisms.

items.q: Why is Any Tec particularly suitable for retail, franchise, and e-commerce businesses?
items.a: Any Tec combines stable IT infrastructures, centralized management, and clear processes, enabling operators to focus on their core business.

m365.description: The complete Office suite, Teams telephony, and SharePoint. Perfectly configured for remote teams. We migrate your data securely and train your team.

network.title: Enterprise Networking
network.description: From Next-Gen Firewall to AI-based Endpoint Protection. We secure your infrastructure holistically. Network, endpoints, and cloud.

devOps.description: Accelerate your delivery pipeline with automated CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code, and containerized environments. Scale with confidence.

itOps.description: Comprehensive IT management for your workforce. From seamless onboarding to 24/7 helpdesk support and hardware lifecycle management.

onprem.title: On-Premises
onprem.description: We take care of your physical infrastructure. From clean cabling in the server room to hardware lifecycle management and office moves.

support.title: Expert Support
support.description: No waiting loops. Direct line to certified experts. We solve problems before they stop your business.

l1.title: User Helpdesk
l1.desc: Quick help for daily problems. Forgot password, printer strike, or Outlook issues? We are there immediately.

l2.title: System Administration
l2.desc: Deep troubleshooting, server maintenance, user management, and configuration changes.

l3.title: Expert Engineering
l3.desc: Architecture issues, complex security incidents, and infrastructure design by Senior Engineers.

setups.title: Setups
setups.description: Choose the setups that fit your space. Selection automatically appears in the contact form.

gastro.name: Gastro Setup
gastro.details: Optimized for high frequency and reliability. We strictly separate POS systems from guest WiFi and seamlessly integrate digital kitchen monitors.

retail.name: Retail Setup
retail.details: Securely connect all branches via VPN. Central updates for your scanners and POS run at night so daily business is not disturbed.

wellness.name: Wellness Setup
wellness.details: Create a relaxed atmosphere without tech frustration. We ensure perfect coverage for smart check-ins and complete silence in privacy zones.

workspace.name: Workspace Setup
workspace.details: Flexible work needs flexible WiFi. Enterprise-level security, but simple enough for guests to log in independently.

entertainment.name: Entertainment Setup
entertainment.details: When thousands of people go online at once, nothing can wobble. High-performance WiFi and redundant internet lines for events.

salon.name: Salon Setup
salon.details: Stable internet for your booking system and tablet POS. Plus a separate network for your clients so they can surf during treatment.

ecommerce.name: Online Store Setup
ecommerce.details: The backend for your shop. We integrate warehouse systems, create interfaces to shipping providers, and monitor server performance 24/7.

contact.title: Does a setup fit for you?
contact.description: Your selection will be sent with the form. Feel free to add details, we'll get back to you in < 24h.
